name: Bridg-It
description:
Cross the abyss by bridging it before your opponent does. But beware, there is something below...

The players move alternately to create a bridge to connect to the other side.

The player who begins has a big advantage and is likely to win, but there is something lurking from the deep.

Single or two player game.
Based on the classic game invented by David Gale and published around 1960.
